Positions this view within an invisible frame having the specified minimum size constraints.
Sets the visibility of the enclosing sheet presentation’s drag indicator.
Drag indicators are only supported on platforms that support sheet
resizing, and sheet resizing is generally only support on mobile.
Adds an action to perform when the user submits a text field within this
view (generally via pressing the Enter/Return key). Outer
handlers get called before inner
handlers. To prevent
submissions from propagating upwards, use
after
adding the handler.
Set the content type of text fields.
Presents a conditional modal overlay.
gets invoked when the sheet is dismissed.
Adds an action to perform when the user’s pointer enters/leaves this view.

which override the font properties of all contained text.

A view with exactly 6 children. Autogenerated as an alternative to Swift’s not yet
production ready variadic generics.
